objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced Manual Controls
• Full HD 1080p Video
• Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Fast autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability at 60fps
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure compensation, and drive modes
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Durable metal top and bottom plates for long-lasting performance

banner_details:
The banner is divided into four distinct quadrants, with a strong geometric layout. The top-left quadrant prominently features the brand and product details, with layered text elements — `brand_name`, `product_name`, `product_category`, and `tagline` — in clean white and light blue fonts on a dark navy-blue background. The top-right quadrant showcases a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) of a camera on a light gray background, balancing the layout visually.

The bottom-left quadrant highlights product specifications listed in `product_features` and the price in bold (`price`), all with white text on a vivid red background. Finally, the bottom-right quadrant emphasizes an emotional marketing message with `heading_1` and `heading_2` in uppercase white text, complemented by a red call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) encouraging a promotional offer.

The use of overlayed circles and elegant separator lines enhances modernity. The font styles are futuristic and bold, adding to the tech-savvy aesthetic of the banner.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#14213D`
- Bright Red: `#D00000`
- Soft Gray: `#E5E5E5`
- Off-White: `#F5F5F5`
- Light Blue Accent: `#A3C4F3`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Shadow Circle: `#0D1A30` (40% opacity)
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, with a sleek and professional look achieved through a modern monochromatic palette. Dominated by deep matte black (#1C1C1C) and accented with metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the dials and lettering, the camera exhibits a high-tech, premium feel. Glossy highlights on the lens add rich charcoal blacks (#2F2F2F) and occasional hints of lens reflection colors such as olive green (#94A64B) and soft amber (#D4A865), creating subtle contrast and interest. These colors blend seamlessly while metallic surfaces reflect light, giving it depth. This balanced color scheme is ideal for a clean, elegant advertisement banner.
